data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample TASIJUPI-211

Exposition W, Slope 30 deg, Geology: Fluviale Sanddüne, Tree line 1200 m, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 1%, Herb cover 1%, Vegatation type: Trockener Förenwald auf Sanddüne, Film number: 1086D
